title: The Sword: Book One of the Knights of Naren
description: Terellion Brightwing leads a simple life in the northern town of Hollowmont, working for the local school after the mines shut down. He returns from a trip for supplies to find the town in turmoil, and discovers he is the one who must save it.In his quest to recover the stolen sword of Hollowmont, Terellion Brightwing must infiltrate the enemy’s castle, and find a way around the mage’s wards protecting the wing of the castle that the sword is located in.Things get much more complicated once he discovers how handsome the mage is.***This book contains sexual situations and is intended for readers aged 18 and over.***
author: M.C. Ewen
